system.requirements: Sorcerer, Intelligence 45, Forbidden Lore (Warp/Daemonology)+10, Scholastic Lore (Occult) +10, 1000xp
system.effect: Sorcerous Powers now have a "Psy Rating" of the character's Full Unmodified Intelligence Bonus, as opposed to Half. Still unaffected by Unnatural Intelligence.

description.value: Sorcerous Powers now have a "Psy Rating" of the character's Full Unmodified Intelligence Bonus, as opposed to Half. Still unaffected by Unnatural Intelligence.
